name: Book Tracker Notion Template
description: Manage your books in one place, so you never lose track of your next great read with this Book Tracker Notion Template.✅ Reading Status Categories – Organize books into Currently Reading, To Be Read (TBR), Wishlist, Did Not Finish (DNF), and Finished for easy tracking.✅ Quick Add Buttons – Seamlessly add new books with a click, saving you time.✅ Customizable Layout – Personalize the tracker to fit your reading style.✅ Notes – Keep track of every book's thoughts, reviews, and quotes.Reading Track
